1.Summary: "Fun. I worked as part of crew. Other workers are fun to work with. Great teamwork. Good first job"
1.Pros: Good hoursWorks well with school schedulesNice co-workersGreat teamworkOK pay
1.Cons: Some costumers are difficult. Not a job for some who does not communicate well

2.Pros: Every day a different challenge. Meeting new people getting to know customers and employees fast pass always something to do
2.Cons: not really cons but stepping stones. hiring to meet volume.con working on Thanksgiving

3.Pros: McDonalds has fast service, their lobby is always kept clean, trash is never overflowing, great customer service, and food is always right.
3.Cons: The McDonalds bathrooms are hardly ever clean, there is a terrible odor coming from the womens bathroom the most.

4.Pros: The ability to move up and continue on with your career.
4.Cons: Depending on the owner the store can be either difficult or easy.

5.Pros: enjoyed my co workers and the fries

6.Cons: too many fries that are tasty

7.Cons: Terrible management, need to listen to employee needs and be respectful

9.Pros: Hours were pretty flexible and I could usually work the hours I wanted since it was open 24 hours a day so if I wanted late I could get hours then and if I wanted morning it was mine
9.Cons: Work environment was slightly intense at times and the grease smell on me all the time was a downer but a good shower is a quick fix so not a huge deal in the end
